scripts.start: (cd backend && del gameMaster.json && copy gameMaster_real.json gameMaster.json) & cd .. && nodemon index.js
scripts.build: (rmdir dist /s /q) & cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && move ./frontend/dist ./dist
scripts.preinstall: cd frontend && npm install && pip install locust
scripts.test: (cd backend && del gameMaster.json && copy gameMaster_test.json gameMaster.json) & cd .. && cd testing && locust
